entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
